name: Curve.fi Factory Plain Pool: d3pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains FEI, FRAX, and alUSD, three decentralized dollar-pegged stablecoins.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains FEI, FRAX, and alUSD, three decentralized dollar-pegged stablecoins.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains FEI, FRAX, and alUSD, three decentralized dollar-pegged stablecoins.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este grupo contiene FEI, FRAX y alUSD, tres monedas estables descentralizadas vinculadas al dólar.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu havuz, FEI, FRAX ve alUSD, üç adet merkezi olmayan dolar sabitlenmiş sabit para içerir.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 FEI, FRAX, 和 alUSD，三个去中心化美元稳定币。
